### EP922-230466 Plumbing and Gas Fitting Standing Offer

**Reference Number**: WS3617054320-Doc3617191056
**Publication Date**: August 30, 2022
**Tender Closing Date**: September 15, 2022, 2:00 PM MDT

#### Notice Details

This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Plumbing and Gas Fitting services. The work will be undertaken on an “as and when” required basis, as per call-ups for services at Correctional Services Canada (CSC) institutions.

The award will be based on the selection criteria of Lowest Price. The standing offer will be issued for a period of three (3) years, with one (1) additional option year.

#### Evaluation and Award

Single-Firm Standing Offer will be evaluated on a competitive, open-bidding basis. The evaluation will be based on price only.

#### Notice Description

The scope of work includes construction, alterations, and urgent repair work for Plumbing and Gas Fitting services at the CSC institutions listed below:

* Bowden Institution and Minimum Security Units (MSU), Innisfail, AB
* Pê Sâkâstêw Centre, Maskwacis, AB

It is anticipated that only one (1) firm will be issued the standing offer.

#### Contract Details

* Contract Type: Standing Offer
* Contract Period: Three (3) years
* Option Period: One (1) year

#### Solicitation Information
